required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Open Label Study Telmisartan and Amlodipine in Hypertension
clinical_study.official_title: An Open Label Follow-up Trial of the Efficacy and Safety of Chronic Administration of the Combination of Telmisartan 40mg + Amlodipine 5mg or the Combination of Telmisartan 80mg + Amlodipine 5mg Tablets Alone or in Combination With Other Antihypertensive Medications in Patients With Hypertension.

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this trial is to assess the efficacy and safety of the fixed dose combinations telmisartan 40 mg / amlodipine 5 mg (T40/A5) or telmisartan 80 mg / amlodipine 5 mg (T80/A5) during long-term open-label treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Trough Seated Diastolic Blood Pressure (DBP) Control
primary_outcome.time_frame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)
primary_outcome.description: The number of patients who reach the target DBP of <90mmHg

secondary_outcome.measure: Trough Seated Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP) Control
secondary_outcome.time_frame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: The number of patients who reach the target SBP of <140mmHg

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Trough Seated Diastolic Blood Pressure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to the end of study in trough DBP. Baseline is defined as visit 3 of trial 1235.5.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in DBP From Last Available Trough in 1235.5 to Last Available Trough in 1235.7
secondary_outcome.time_frame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: The difference between the last available troughs represents the additional reduction in DBP in this study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Trough Seated Systolic Blood Pressure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to the end of study in trough SBP. Baseline is defined as visit 3 of trial 1235.5.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in SBP From Last Available Trough in 1235.5 to Last Available Trough in 1235.7
secondary_outcome.time_frame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: The difference between the last available troughs represents the additional reduction in SBP in this study

secondary_outcome.time_frame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: The number of patients who reach the target DBP of <90mmHg or had a reduction in DBP >= 10mmHg

secondary_outcome.time_frame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: The number of patients who reach the target SBP of <140mmHg or had a reduction in SBP >= 15 mmHg

secondary_outcome.time_frame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: The number of patients who reach predefined BP categories

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At any point during open-label treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Time from first intake of medication to first intake of an antihypertensive other than the study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients Requiring Additional Antihypertensive Therapy to Achieve DBP Control
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At any point during open-label treatment
secondary_outcome.description: The number of patients with DBP control (DBP<90 mmHg). Last trough DBP measurement before taking additional antihypertensive compared to last trough DBP taken on treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Additional Reduction in DBP by Use of Additional Antihypertensive Therapy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At any point during open-label treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in trough DBP from last visit before add-on therapy and last visit during 1235.7

secondary_outcome.measure: Additional Reduction in SBP by Use of Additional Antihypertensive Therapy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At any point during open-label treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in trough SBP from last visit before add-on therapy and last visit during 1235.7

secondary_outcome.measure: Trough DBP Control Pre- and Post- Uptitration
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At any point during open-label treatment
secondary_outcome.description: The number of patients with DBP control (DBP<90 mmHg). Last trough DBP measurement before uptitration to Telmisartan 80mg compared to first trough DBP taken after uptitration

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. patients aged at least 18 years
2. diagnosis of essential hypertension and blood pressure not adequately controlled before enrolment in the preceding trial.
3. failure to respond to six weeks treatment with Amlodipine 5 mg in the run-in period of the preceding trial.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. pre-menopausal women who are not surgically sterile; or are nursing or pregnant; or are not practising acceptable means of birth control or do not plan to continue using acceptable means of birth control throughout the study
2. development of any medical condition in the preceding trial that in the investigator's opinion could be worsened by treatment with either Telmisartan 40 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg or Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg
3. discontinuation from the preceding trial because of any adverse event or any other reason
4. known or suspected secondary hypertension
5. mean seated Systolic Blood Pressure => 180 mmHg and/or mean seated Diastolic Blood Pressure => 120 mmHg at any visit

outcome.title: Trough Seated Diastolic Blood Pressure (DBP) Control
outcome.description: The number of patients who reach the target DBP of <90mmHg
outcome.time_frame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)
outcome.population: The full analysis set of patients. All patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose

measure.population: The full analysis set of patients. All patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose

outcome.population: All patients who took at least one dose of study medication, have a trough baseline measurement (Visit 3 1235.5) and at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose

class.title: Normal (SBP<130 and DBP<85 mmHg and not optimal)
High-normal (SBP<140 DBP<90 mmHg and not normal)

outcome.title: Time to First Additional Antihypertensive
outcome.description: Time from first intake of medication to first intake of an antihypertensive other than the study drug
outcome.time_frame: At any point during open-label treatment
outcome.population: Patients from the full analysis set who took additional antihypertensive medication as defined by the investigator. Full analysis set defined as all patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose

outcome.description: The number of patients with DBP control (DBP<90 mmHg). Last trough DBP measurement before uptitration to Telmisartan 80mg compared to first trough DBP taken after uptitration

reported_events.time_frame: From day of first dose until one day after last dose
reported_events.desc: Safety analysis treatment groups were based upon actual treatment received at the time of the event regardless of add-on antihypertensive. All patients started the study on Telmisartan 40mg and amlodipine 5mg and were up-titrated according to DBP response. Explaining the large number of patients exposed to T40/A5 compared to T80/A5

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Any publication of the result of this trial must be consistent with the Boehringer Ingelheim publication policy. The rights of the investigator and of the sponsor with regard to publication of the results of this trial are described in the investigator contract.
